content: मरुः [म्रियंतेऽस्मिन्भूतानीति मरुः निर्जलदेशः, मृ-उ <ls>Uṇ. 1. 7</ls>] {@--1@} A desert sandy desert, a wilderness, any region destitute of water. {@--2@} A mountain or rock. {@--3@} A kind of plant (कुरबक). {@--4@} Abstinence from drinking. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>pl.</ab> <ab>N.</ab> of a country or its inhabitants.
